code: import BigNumber from'bignumber.js';export var getBalanceNumber=function getBalanceNumber(balance,pid){var decimals=18;if(pid===5)decimals=9;var displayBalance=new BigNumber(balance).dividedBy(new BigNumber(10).pow(decimals));return displayBalance.toNumber();};export var getFullDisplayBalance=function getFullDisplayBalance(balance,tokenName){var decimals=18;if(tokenName==="TINV")decimals=9;return balance.dividedBy(new BigNumber(10).pow(decimals)).toFixed();};
